hymn.title: He Has Made the Earth by His Power

layout.singingstanza: He has made the earth by His pow -- er; He has es -- tab -- lished the world by His wis -- dom; And has stretched out the heav -- en by His un -- der -- stand -- ing. He has made the earth; Es -- tab -- lished the world; And has stretched out the heav -- en!
layout.sheetcopyright: www.hymnal.net; © 2012 Bible StorySongs, Inc. Used by permission.

lyrics.stanza: Verses 1 and 2 can be sung together.
